header.descripcion: Web developer passionate about technology and programming

1.descripcion:
My name is Carles and I am 28 years old. I live near Barcelona and currently work as a frontend dev at Promo-soft, a company dedicated to developing technological solutions for Call Centers.

For more than 6 years I have used my knowledge developing frontend projects, a subject that little by little has become my passion.

2.descripcion:
I started studying a CFGM in Microcomputer Systems and Networks(SMX), and then I studied the CFGS in multiplatform application development(DAM).

Subsequently, I specialized in a FrontEnd Developer with VUE course at the UAB, however, most of my knowledge was acquired self-taught while working as a developer.

3.descripcion:
During my 6 years of experience at Promo-Soft I have carried out numerous front-end projects in a self-sufficient way.

I have taken the opportunity to grow, nourish myself with knowledge and mature in my work as a frontend dev.

4.descripcion: In terms of ambition and future perspective, I am characterized by personal improvement, sharing knowledge and building exciting projects together with the team.

1.descripcion: The commitment, loyalty and honesty are my values and principles thanks to the education obtained.

2.descripcion: I understand the needs of the group and I accept the proposed changes in order to improve and advance.

3.descripcion: Technology advances very quickly and I always live with the concern of learning more skills to improve.

4.descripcion: As a frontend developer I have acquired some ability to identify UI needs that clients may have.

5.descripcion: Resilience is something to look after. Looking for alternatives and resolving conflicts under pressure.

6.descripcion: Work as a team and share knowledge to advance and prosper both inside and outside the workplace.
